original_title: 童貞部長と相部屋逆NTR ～50過ぎてSEXしたことない上司を…彼氏持ちリア充新卒OLが一晩中ヤリまくっちゃった!～ 青空ひかり
overview: A respected director avoids his destiny of being a perma-virgin, with Hikari Aozora no less.
title: Virgin Director Shared Room Reverse NTR ~ A Boss Who Has Never had sex After 50… A rookie OL Spoils him All Night! ~ Hikari Aozora
